source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
    d.DepartmentID,
    d.Name AS DepartmentName,
    a.City AS Location  
FROM 
    HumanResources.Department d
JOIN 
    HumanResources.EmployeeDepartmentHistory edh ON d.DepartmentID = edh.DepartmentID
JOIN 
    HumanResources.Employee e ON edh.BusinessEntityID = e.BusinessEntityID
JOIN 
    Person.Address a ON e.BusinessEntityID = a.AddressID  
GROUP BY
    d.DepartmentID, d.Name, a.City;

scripts.text:
WITH UniqueSource AS (
    SELECT
        DepartmentID,
        DepartmentName,
        Location,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DepartmentID ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS RowNum
    FROM staging.dept
)
MERGE INTO hr.DimDepartment AS Target
USING (SELECT * FROM UniqueSource WHERE RowNum = 1) AS Source
ON Target.DepartmentID = Source.DepartmentID
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET
        Target.DepartmentName = Source.DepartmentName,
        Target.Location = Source.Location
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET THEN
    INSERT (DepartmentID, DepartmentName, Location)
    VALUES (Source.DepartmentID, Source.DepartmentName, Source.Location);
